name: Dross of Pure Sacred Dewdrop
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  Legends say that before the birth of life, there was a dense primordial sea.It is the purest origin of all things, and one day, it will also swallow alllife... and those things which did not arise from it will be filtered out,becoming naught but floating detritus.  "The existence of detritus also has meaning — What kind of thing would berejected by the source of all things that swallows all life?" the youngHarmost asked the great usurper, pondering this conundrum.
